allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat\(wechat\): add WeChat 4.x channel extension and bridge

- Add extensions/wechat: TypeScript extension for WeChat channel
  - channel.ts: WeChat channel implementation
  - gateway.ts: WebSocket gateway for wxauto-bridge
  - config.ts: Configuration management
  - types.ts: Type definitions

- Add wxauto-bridge: Python bridge for WeChat 4.x
  - wechat_handler.py: WeChat automation using pyautogui
  - bridge.py: WebSocket server for communication
  - Support for sending and receiving messages
  - Uses double-click + Ctrl+C for message reading
  - Uses Ctrl+F search for opening chats

Note: WeChat 4.x uses Qt framework which doesn''t expose
UI Automation controls, so we use keyboard/mouse simulation
instead of uiautomation library.
EOF
\)")
